title: Telomere length as a predictor of therapy response and survival in patients diagnosed with ovarian carcinoma
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Kristyna Tomasova, Karolina Seborova, Michal Kroupa, Josef Horak, Miriam Kavec, Ludmila Vodickova, Lukas Rob, Martin Hruda, Marcela Mrhalova, Alena Bartakova, Jiri Bouda, Thomas Fleischer, Vessela N. Kristensen, Pavel Vodicka, Radka Vaclavikova
